document_data.name: Ferran Martinez
document_data.mainbody: Councilman '''Ferran Martinez''' was a member of the [[Council of Ten]] in [[Phlan]] and a priest of [[Tyr]] during the midâ€”14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Ferran led a group of citizens to [[Sokol Keep]] where they hid during the [[Dragon Run]] attack on Phlan. His entire group eventually perished within the keep.
